reviews.review_msg: Avoid her  I wanted her to check my paragraph, she doesn't even read them all, then say whole bunch of problems in the paragraph. She never likes anything other than her work. By the way, the paragraph was written by a TA as an example.
Dichupa is defintely a nice lady. She is willing to help at all time, even at her leisure time. hmmm she is just okay
not bad and definitely ask for help when needed and talk!
